summary: The document is a classified FBI record pertaining to the investigation of President John F. Kennedy's assassination. It includes a memorandum from the Paris Embassy about a letter in Spanish, with the Paris Office requesting the High General Staff in Madrid, Spain, to investigate the sender for any pertinent information.
key_findings: The document is part of the records released under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992.
It involves a request from the FBI's Paris Office to the High General Staff in Madrid to investigate a letter in Spanish related to the assassination.
The document was originally classified as 'Secret' and has undergone review, with some redactions applied.
